raidItems.name: The Abyssal Pincer
raidItems.tooltip:
The Abyssal PincerBinds when picked upUnique
Main Hand
Fist Weapon
87 - 163 Damage
Speed 2.60
(48.1 damage per second)
+4 Strength
+5 Stamina
Requires Level 60
Equip: Improves your chance to get a critical strike by 1%.
Chance on hit: Blasts the target for 120 Frost damage, reducing movement speed by 20% for 2 seconds.

Polearm
175 - 263 Damage
Speed 3.50
(62.6 damage per second)
+23 Stamina
Requires Level 60
Equip: +36 Attack Power.
Equip: Improves your chance to hit by 2%.
Equip: Your landing ranged and melee attacks have a 5% chance to increase your Agility by 75 for 10 sec.

raidItems.name: Anchor of the Wavecutter
raidItems.tooltip:
Anchor of the WavecutterBinds when picked upUnique
Two-hand
Mace
182 - 269 Damage
Speed 3.60
(62.6 damage per second)
+13 Strength
+11 Intellect
Requires Level 60
Equip: Improves your chance to hit by 1%.
Equip: Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 32.
Chance on hit: Inflicts 200 Frost damage to enemies in a cone in front of you, reducing movement speed by 20% for 5 seconds.
"The anchor of Daelin Proudmoore's flagship, now infused by the essence of the Abyssal Pincer."
